name: JSFiddle: Night
description: A dark layout for the newest UI update for JS Fiddle. Some screenshots are included to show you the styling of portions of the website. Further updates are coming soon.
additional_info:
Version 1.4 (April 20th, 2016)
  • Fixed the CSS so that the style displays on HTTPS instead of HTTP.
Version 1.3 (Dec 10th, 2015)
  • Changed the scrollbar to something much more pleasant and sleeker that matches the custom theme.
  • Added a border next to the sidebar for clarity purposes.
 Version 1.2 (Dec 9th, 2015)
  • Changed the opacity of the panel settings so that you can see your code through them.
 Version 1.1 (Dec 9th, 2015)
  • Added syntax colors that are much easier to see with a darker background.
  • Tweaked the colors of a few things; Very minor change.
  • Updated the screenshots with images of the most recent update.
